precautions.zh: 苹果含糖量较高，糖尿病患者应适量食用。
precautions.en: Apples are high in sugar; people with diabetes should consume them in moderation.

storage.zh: 置于阴凉干燥处或冰箱冷藏可延长保鲜期。
storage.en: Store in a cool, dry place or refrigerate to extend freshness.

nutrition.zh: 富含维生素C和膳食纤维。
nutrition.en: Rich in vitamin C and dietary fiber.

nutrition.zh: 富含抗氧化物和膳食纤维，热量较低。
nutrition.en: Rich in antioxidants and dietary fiber, lower in calories.

precautions.zh: 香蕉性寒，不宜空腹食用，腹泻者慎食。
precautions.en: Bananas are cold in nature and should not be eaten on an empty stomach; avoid if experiencing diarrhea.

storage.zh: 放在阴凉通风处保存，避免阳光直射，成熟后可冷藏延缓变质。
storage.en: Store in a cool, ventilated place away from direct sunlight. Refrigerate when ripe to slow spoilage.

nutrition.zh: 富含钾、维生素B6和膳食纤维，有助于能量补充与肠道健康。
nutrition.en: Rich in potassium, vitamin B6, and dietary fiber, supporting energy and digestive health.
